author: Curtis Swanson
comment: Tribble app for my Galaxy S7 and Gear S2. Downloaded twice, paid twice, nothing showed up on my phone or watch. I want a refund!!!

reply.author: WatchMaster
reply.content:
Hello Curtis. 
Since you are a Gear user you'll have to download individual watchfaces from Samsung Galaxy store. Google Play watchfaces are for Android wear users only. Hope this helped, if you have any other questions please contact us via email (ask.watchmaster@gmail.com). Thank you and best regards.

author: Zeth Odderskov
comment: I love it, and it customizable in the best ways. Loving the feature with the batteri life. Great job!!
title: Best watchface evuuuh!!

author: UnitZER0
comment: Visually stunning, and stylish, this watch face is great to look at, and provides easy to read info. Unfortunately, that's about where it ends... This face provides zero interactivity, and crashes every couple hours with alarming regularity. Stay away, except to show off what your watch can do.
title: Good, when it works...
